Data gazes deeply into his double's identical features.  Then he opens a panel in the B-9's neck and uses a small instrument to activate the android's head. The B-9's eyes spring to life.  He looks at Data.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brother.  I cannot move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I have only activated your cognitive and communication subroutines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you are dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have been programmed to gather information that can be used against this ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know anything about Shinzon's plans against the Federation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have any knowledge of the tactical abilities of his ship?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  Can I move now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  I must deactivate you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For how long?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indefinitely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long is that? A beat.  Data gazes at the B-9 deeply.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A long time, brother. Data reaches forward and deactivates his brother. The B-9's eyes lose the spark of life.  He stands, frozen. Data stands before him. INT.  ENTERPRISE - OBSERVATION LOUNGE - NIGHT Picard is gathered with his senior officers. A computer display illustrates Geordi's words about the power of Shinzon's weapon.  We see a chilling graphic of the Biogenic Pulse beam spreading around a ship, then a whole planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's called a Cascading Biogenic Pulse.  The unique properties of Thalaron radiation allow the energy beam to expand almost without limits.  Depending on the radiant intensity it could encompass a ship... or a planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (thinking) And that's exactly what he's going to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His hatred of the Federation is apparent.  He would have built a weapon of that scope for one reason.  He is going after Earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh boy.  Destroy humanity and the Federation is crippled...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the Romulans invade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you be certain?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know how he thinks. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Geordi) And there's no way to penetrate his cloak?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (frustrated) He could pass within 10 meters of every ship in Starfleet and they'd never know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we do have one advantage. (to Picard) He needs your blood to live.  He might come after you first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm counting on it... We've been ordered to head to sector 3274. Starfleet is diverting the fleet to meet us there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strength in numbers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can only hope so. A beat as he looks at them gravely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can't be allowed to use that weapon.  All other concerns are secondary.  Do you understand me? Riker knows exactly what Picard is saying: the Enterprise is expendable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. Picard stands.  Presses a comm button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All hands.  Battle stations. INT.  ENTERPRISE - VARIOUS ANGLES We see a montage of the Enterprise preparing for battle. Crew members assume battle stations.  Weapons locker ring open and Security Officers hand out sidearms and phaser rifles. Geordi and his Engineers establish emergency force field around the warp core. Riker and Worf brief officers on tactical plans... Data works at the bridge Science Station, analyzing data on Shinzon's ship. Picard walks through the corridors, he stops to talk with apprehensive young ensign. As we hear:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain's Personal Log. Supplemental.  We're heading toward Federation space at maximum warp. The crew has responded with the dedication I've come to expect of them.  And like a thousand other commanders on a thousand other battlefields throughout history, I wait for the dawn. The montage ends as... INT.  ENTERPRISE - SICKBAY - NIGHT Picard enters sickbay. Dr. Crusher and her medical staff are hard at work.  They position anti-grav gurneys and ready medical supplies. Security officers are handing out phasers. Picard watches the grim preparations.  Beverly goes to him, bolstering her phaser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) To seek out new life and new civilizations.  Zephyr Cochran's own words.  When Charles Darwin set out on the H.M.S. Beagle, on his journey into the unknown... he sailed without a single musket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gently) That was another time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How far we've come.  Let me know if you need anything. He starts to go -- BEVERLY Jean Luc... (he stops) ... He is not you. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What makes us who we are, Doctor? Can you tell me that? She watches him go. INT.  SCIMITAR BRIDGE - NIGHT Shinzon sits in his command chair, lined with veins now. His Viceroy again has his hand pressed to Shinzon's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A matter of hours now -- Shinzon shoves him away.  Stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you don't begin the procedure soon you'll never make it back to Romulus.  You shouldn't have delayed.  You should have killed Picard the moment -- Shinzon slams his command chair in fury.  The Viceroy watches him carefully. A beat.  Shinzon regains his composure.  He sits again in his command chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long until we reach the Rift?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (checks a console) Seven minutes. Shinzon leans back, satisfied.  And looks at the viewscreen. The image on the viewscreen is shocking. The Enterprise only a few hundred yards away. EXT.  ENTERPRISE - SPACE The Enterprise zooms through space. Completely unaware of the predator directly above it. INT.  ENTERPRISE - ASTROMETRICS - NIGHT Data is at work in Astrometry.  Cartographic projections of star systems ebb and flow on a large screen before him. Picard enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show me our current position. The images before them quickly change to show another sector and a blip representing the Enterprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long until we reach the fleet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At our current velocity we will arrive at sector 3274 in approximately 40 minutes. The images before them change to show sector 3274.  We see blips denoting Starfleet ships moving into position. Picard gazes at the projection of stars before them for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) "For now we see but through a glass darkly..."  He said he's a mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not agree.  Although you share the same genetic structure, the events of your life have created unique individual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But so much is the same.  On a biological level he is... and I will not accept the idea that there is nothing I can do.  I have a responsibility to try to make a human connection with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He would deny a "human" connection is possible.  He considers himself entirely Reman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He may have already rejected my humanity, but you also have a twin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, sir, it is not possible.  The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is physically identical to me, although his neural pathways are not as advanced.  But even if they were, he would not be me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you be sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I aspire, sir.  To be better than I am.  The B-9 does not.  Nor does Shinzon. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll never know what Shinzon might have been.  Had he stood where I did as a child?  And looked up at the stars. Picard's words linger in the air for a moment. Then the projections before them sputter with static for a moment.  Flickering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (working controls) We are passing through the Bassen Rift.  The projections will return when we have cleared it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's interfering with our uplink from Starfleet cartography?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.  The Rift effects all long-range communications -- PICARD (urgent, to comm) Commander Riker, evasive maneuvers! Too late. The ship QUAKES -- a photon torpedo blast -- the Enterprise is under attack! EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE Disruptor beams appear from nowhere -- streaking through space -- slamming into the Enterprise's warp drive.  The Enterprise recoils, dangerously dropping out of warp in a furious lurch. The Bassen Rift is a strange area of electromagnetic distortion.  Energy patterns crackle through space. INT.  SCIMITAR BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Shinzon sits in his command chair.  The viewscreen shows the Enterprise before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Target weapons systems and shields. I don't want the Enterprise destroyed. On the viewscreen, we see disruptor blasts streaking from the Scimitar -- slicing into the Enterprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you learn to see in the dark, Captain? INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Picard and Data emerge from the turbolift as the ship ROCKS -- PICARD Report.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's firing through his cloak.  We can't get a lock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (at engineering station) He disabled our warp drive with his first shot.  We've only got impulse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Long range communication is impossible as long as we're in the rift -- The ship SHUDDERS again -- PICARD Worf, prepare a full phaser spread, zero elevation.  All banks on my mark.  Scan for shield impacts and stand by photon torpedoes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye, sir The ship ROCKS again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire! EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE The Enterprise fires her phasers simultaneously -- the energy beams shoot into space -- And the Scimitar's shape is momentarily illuminated as one of its shields is hit. Photon torpedoes immediately shoot from the Enterprise -- but pass harmlessly through the area where the Scimitar's shields were momentarily illuminated. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING SHINZON You're too slow, old man. (entering commands in his chair console) Attack pattern Shinzon Theta. EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE The invisible Warbird makes a dramatic run straight over the Enterprise -- firing steadily down as it sweeps past it; is a brutal, close range assault -- INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING The bridge SHAKES violently under the ruthless attack--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are losing dorsal shields -- PICARD Full axis rotation to port!  Fire all ventral phasers! EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE The Enterprise instantly complies -- Rolling completely over to the left, firing phasers up as Shinzon's invisible ship streaks above it -- A few lucky phaser shots from the bottom of the Enterprise -- now shooting upward -- manage to momentarily illuminate the bottom shields of the Scimitar as it sweeps past above. INT.  ENTERPRISE BRIDGE - FOLLOWING WORF Minimal damage to the Scimitar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Helm) Defensive pattern Kirk Epsilon. Geordi, get those shields online.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to comm) Counselor Troi, report to the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unless we can disable his cloak we're just going to be firing in the dark. PlCARD Agreed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, we're being hailed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On screen. Shinzon appears on the viewscreen.  He is on the bridge of the Scimitar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain Picard, will you join me in your Ready Room? INT.  ENTERPRISE - READY ROOM Picard stands in his Ready Room.  A flickering light shimmers across the room.  And a perfect holographic representation of Shinzon appears before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't trace my holographic emitters, Captain.  So don't bother.  And you can't contact Starfleet.  We're quite alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just the two of us now, Jean Luc, as it should be... Your ship and mine... You and me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To accept your surrender.  I can clearly destroy you at any time. Lower your shields and allow me to transport you to my ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what of the Enterprise?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have little interest in your quaint vessel, Captain.  If the Enterprise will withdraw to a distance of one hundred light years, it will not be harmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know that's not possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know... you'll all gladly die to save your home world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (intense) Look at me, Shinzon!  Do you feel the blood pumping inside you?  Your hands, your eyes, your nature, are the same as mine.  Buried deep inside you beneath the years of pain and anger is a capacity you've forgotten.  It's the one way our mirror can reflect the two of us exactly because it's the very thing that truly defines us.  To be human is to try to make yourself better than you are. Picard looks at him deeply, relentlessly refusing to give up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know you as well as I know myself, Shinzon.  There was a time you looked at the stars and dreamed of what might be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) Long ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not so long.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Childish dreams, Captain.  Lost in the dilithium mines of Remus.  I'm what you see now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see more than what you are. Picard steps toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see what you could be. Shinzon slowly backs away as Picard continues to move toward him relentlessly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The man who is Jean Luc Picard and Shinzon of Remus won't exterminate the population of an entire planet! He is better than that!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (desperate) He is what his life has made him! Shinzon is in turmoil.  Picard senses this.  He proceeds quietly:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what will he do with that life? Shinzon looks at him, questioning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I were to beam to your ship... let you complete your medical procedure, give you a full life... what would you do with the time? Shinzon doesn't respond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You once asked me about your past. Your history.  When I was your age, I burned with ambition.  I was very proud and my pride often hurt people.  I made every wrong choice a young man can... But one thing saved me... I had a father who believed in me.  Who took the time to teach me a better way.  You have the same father.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So if I gave you my life, what would you do with it?  Would you spend the years in a blaze of hatred as you are now?  Or could you change?  Could you try to remember a mother's touch you never felt?  A father's words you never heard?  Could you do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you want to. Shinzon doesn't respond.  But Picard knows he has made a connection.  For this brief moment reconciliation is possible.  He proceeds quietly:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me tell you about our father. Shinzon looks at him with an aching sadness.  What might have been.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's your life... not mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's too late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can still make a choice!  Make the right one now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no choices!  I can't fight what I am! Shinzon backs away, unable to fight his nature:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll show you my true nature.  Your nature.  And as Earth dies -- remember that I'm forever Shinzon of Remus!  And my voice will echo through time long after yours has faded to a dim memory. Shinzon ends the transmission and his holographic image flickers and fades away. Picard stands alone, drained. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Shinzon strides quickly to his command chair, barking to his Viceroy:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disable their weapons! But before the Viceroy can move the Scimitar suddenly ROCKS -- attacked from somewhere!  Shinzon is stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Report!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two ships decloaking, sir! Romulan! INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Picard strides to his command chair as two Romulan Warbirds appear on the viewscreen.  Deanna is now on the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Believe it or not, I think the cavalry has arrived.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're being hailed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On screen. On the viewscreen: Commander Donatra shimmers into view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain Picard, Commander Donatra of the Warbird Valdore.  Might we be of assistance?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your timing is impeccable, Commander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Empire considers this a matter of internal security.  We regret you've become involved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When this is over, I owe you a drink. On the viewscreen, the Valdore ROCKS from a disruptor blast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Romulan ale, Captain.  Let's get to work.  Valdore out. The transmission ends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Worf) You heard the lady.  Get to work. Move your ass! (The Romulan Warbirds must remain decloaked to fire weapons and are visible throughout the battle.) Although Shinzon's ship is still cloaked, the steady barrage of triangulated phaser and disruptor fire from the Enterprise and the two Romulan vessels illuminate its shields with impacts. INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING PICARD (to Worf) Coordinate our attack with the Valdore's tactical officer. Triangulate fire on any shield impacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye, sir. The Enterprise ROCKS from a photon torpedo impact -- DATA Aft shields are down to forty percent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Helm) Keep our bow to the Scimitar. Auxiliary power to forward shields. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Shinzon sits quite calmly in his command chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Target the flanking Warbird.  All forward disruptor banks on my mark. EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE It is a chaos of starships as the Enterprise and the two Warbirds fire steadily -- illuminating the Scimitar's shields. The ships sweep around one another, maneuvering for position, firing constantly.  The battlefield seems impossibly crowded as the four vessels evade and attack; as phaser and disruptor beams criss-cross space. Then the Scimitar unleashes a devastating volley... all her forward disruptor banks fire at once -- They literally cut one of the Romulan ships in half -- a huge EXPLOSION -- debris SHOOTS across space and SLAMS VIOLENTLY off the Enterprise's forward shields -- ! INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING The ship ROCKS dangerously!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forward shields are down to ten percent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Helm) Bring us about! EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE The Enterprise quickly turns about -- firing her aft phasers, as the Valdore sweeps toward Shinzon's ship, firing -- INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING SHINZON Let her pursue -- drop cloak on the aft port quadrant and prepare for full emergency stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (startled) What?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You heard me. INT.  VALDORE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Donatra leans forward in her command chair, looking at viewscreen.  She sees part of the Scimitar's rear cloakning fall away -- DONATRA She's losing her cloak!  Stand by all forward disruptor banks! INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING VICEROY She's almost on us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet. On the viewscreen  we see the Valdore in pursuit, gaining. The Reman crew is getting nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Praetor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE The Scimitar LURCHES to a stop!  Too fast for the Valdore to respond in time -- it flies over the Scimitar -- And the Scimitar fires! A devastating volley of photon torpedoes rip into the underbelly and aft of the Valdore as it streaks past -- The Valdore careens out of control and then slows to a stop. It floats dead in space. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING SHINZON Restore the aft cloak.and bring us about. He leans back in his command chair, ready for the final battle. INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING A bloody Commander Donatra is talking to Picard on viewscreen.  Her bridge is in ruins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid that drink will have to wait, Captain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have life support?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the moment.  But we're dead in the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Understood -- Then the ship ROCKS -- EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE The invisible Scimitar sweeps past for a particularly brutal assault -- disruptor blasts streak along the Enterprise's hull -- a huge, ripping series of explosions tear away several decks of the Enterprise -- INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING DATA We have lost structural integrity on decks twelve through seventeen, sections four through ten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emergency force fields are holding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Evacuate those decks and reroute field power to forward shields. Deanna goes to Picard:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain -- I might have a way to find them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Counselor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The one thing he may have forgotten in the course of battle: me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make it so. She quickly goes to Worf at tactical. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - NIGHT Shinzon is entering tactical commands in his chair console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prepare a lateral run -- all starboard disruptors. Then the viceroy suddenly stiffens, alarm in his eyes -- VICEROY No! INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Deanna concentrates furiously, eyes closed.  She stands with Worf, her hand slowly moving his over the photon torpedo targeting display. It is a wrenching experience as she probes with her thoughts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's resisting me. She is in pain. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING The Viceroy concentrates, trying to block her probing thoughts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?!  Focus on your job!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is here. INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Deanna continues to move Worf's hand over the targeting display.  She is sweating, panting for breath, concentrating fiercely. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING The Viceroy resists her -- their psyches lock in battle. Deanna appears in the Viceroy's mind, she glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember me? INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Her eyes snap open -- DEANNA NOW! Worf instantly fires a full volley of photon torpedoes. EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE A full spread of photon torpedoes shoot through space. And connect!  A series of devastating impacts -- and the Scimitar's cloak fails! INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Picard stands quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Savage them! EXT.  THE RIFT - SPACE And the Enterprise attacks! It fires all weapons simultaneously -- phasers and photon torpedoes slam into the Scimitar!  Shinzon's ship responds quickly -- maneuvering for position and returning fire! INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING The bridge has been damaged, sparks sputter through the darkness and debris litters the deck. Shinzon eyes reflect a growing sense of desperation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (spinning to his Viceroy) Prepare a boarding party -- BRING ME PICARD! The viceroy strides out as Shinzon spins to another officer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the cloak back!  And target shield coordinates beta three.  All disruptors.  Fire! On the viewscreen, we see disruptor beams focusing on a tiny part of the Enterprise's lower shields, slamming into them. INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - NIGHT DATA Captain, we have lost ventral shielding on deck twenty nine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Divert power and compensate -- An alarm klaxon suddenly rings through the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Intruder alert!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go. Riker and Worf quickly head toward the turbolift as:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to comm) Security detail to deck twenty nine. Data immediately assumes Worf's position at tactical. INT.  ENTERPRISE - LOWER DECKS - NIGHT Riker and Worf stride with a SECURITY DETAIL through the cramped lower decks. A sudden disruptor blast stops them cold!  The Viceroy and his invasion force of a dozen Reman Warriors are down the corridor! The Enterprise crew returns fire.  It is a blazing phaser battle, Worf leading his men with Klingon courage.  They steadily advance in the face of the blistering disruptor fire -- They are getting the upper hand when Riker sees the Viceroy escape into a Jefferies tube -- RIKER Worf. Worf instantly dives into the corridor -- landing hard and sliding forward on his stomach all the while firing a steady burst from his phaser rifle. Riker uses the cover to dive after the Viceroy, following him into the dark Jefferies tube, intent on destroying the man who has been tormenting his wife -- INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING The Scimitar sweeps into view on the viewscreen -- filling the screen -- and launches a ferocious volley of photon torpedoes. A huge EXPLOSION as the viewscreen and some of the forward bridge are BLOWN APART -- the Helm Officer is SUCKED INTO SPACE before a flickering emergency force field springs into position -- Deanna races to assume the helm -- Picard can now see his enemy directly through the gaping hole in the ship's hull -- he sees the Scimitar banking for another attack run as part of the ship disappears -- GEORDI He's getting his cloak back.  We have exhausted our compliment of photon torpedoes.  Phaser banks are down to four percent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if we target all phasers in a concentrated attack?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Scimitar's shields are still at seventy percent.  It would make no difference, sir. Picard thinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're stopping... Through the hole in the hull, Picard sees the Scimitar slowly turning.  Slowly advancing.  They see another part of the Scimitar disappear, the cloak returning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's he doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grim) He wants to look me in the eye. INT.  ENTERPRISE - JEFFERIES TUBE - FOLLOWING Below decks, Riker stalks the Viceroy through a labyrinthine series of access tunnels.  It is like a scene from ALIEN. The flickering half-light and red emergency strobes of the crippled ship make this an ominous sequence.  The Viceroy is in his element, used to the perpetual night of the Reman Homeworld, he can see in the dark. Riker moves through the darkness, hunting for the Viceroy. He stops, phaser ready.  He peers into the dark tunnel ahead of him.  Sees nothing.  We tilt up and see... The Viceroy clinging to the ceiling directly above Riker! Hidden in the darkness.  The Viceroy attacks! -- diving down on Riker -- his lethal Reman knife slashing through the darkness -- INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Picard stands... watching the Scimitar maneuver into position.  Large parts of it are now cloaked. It stops.  Only a few hundred yards from the Enterprise, its great prow almost filling the gaping hole at the front of the bridge. Picard thinks, his mind racing.  Then it comes to him in a flash:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He thinks he knows exactly what I'm going to do...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got him! He sits in his command chair and begins quickly entering command instructions in his chair console. INT.  SCIMITAR - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Shinzon, supremely confident, leans back in his command chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open a channel. INT.  ENTERPRISE - BRIDGE - FOLLOWING Picard is still entering commands in his chair console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are being hailed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deanna, stand by. (to Data) Open a channel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you're still alive, Jean Luc.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you think it's time to surrender?  I'll have my cloak back in a matter of minutes and your poor ship is shot to pieces.  Why should the rest of your crew have to die? Picard continues to enter command codes -- transmits them to Deanna at helm -- she receives the commands, nods.  All of this as Picard buys some time:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never told you about my first Academy evaluation, did I?  I received very high marks for my studies.  But I was found lacking in certain other areas. Personality traits, you might say. In particular I was thought to be extremely... (he glares up at the prow of the Scimitar) ... over-confident. Picard indicates for Data to end the communication.  Then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quickly) Geordi, put 211 power to the engines.  Take it from life support if you have to -- everything you can give me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deanna, on my mark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready, sir! Picard leans forward in his chair:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on comm) All hands, brace for impact! (to Deanna)
direction.name: direction
